title: Iran’s President Backs ‘Fair’ Talks With U.S. as Confrontation Looms
summary_full: President Masoud Pezeshkian said on Tuesday that he supported “equitable negotiations.” Talks are expected on Friday, as diplomats work to defuse the crisis.
summary_public: President Masoud Pezeshkian said on Tuesday that he supported “equitable negotiations.” Talks are expected on Friday, as diplomats work to defuse the crisis.

IR.label: positive
IR.evidence: Iran’s President Backs ‘Fair’ Talks With U.S. as Confrontation Looms
